pages.text: $(li)The Glowsilk Bow is a directly upgrade of the Bow.$(br)$(li)When you fire an Arrow with the Glowsilk Bow and this one falls on the ground, the arrow will light up the surroundings.$(br)$(li)If the arrow hits an enemy, it will light up by the Luminance effect.

pages.name: Glowsilk Bow
pages.text: If the arrow hits an enemy, it will light up by the Luminance effect.
$(li)If the creature that is hit with the Arrow is a Zombie or Skeleton, the light of Luminance effect will burn it.
